description:
The `k-collection` component is a wrapper around `k-items`
that adds sortabilty and pagination to the items.

props.name: columns
props.description: Optional column settings for the table layout

props.name: fields
props.description: Optional fields configuration that is used for table layout

props.name: items
props.description: Array of item definitions. See `k-item` for available options.

props.name: link
props.description: Enable/disable that each item is a clickable link

props.name: sortable
props.description:
Whether items are generally sortable.
Each item can disable this individually.

props.name: empty
props.description: Empty state, see `k-empty` for all options

props.name: help
props.description: Help text to show below the collection

props.name: pagination
props.description:
Whether pagination should be shown, and if,
pagination options (see `k-pagination` for details)
